alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; Goshen County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 6:40PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Kimball, south central Goshen and northeastern Laramie Counties through 715 PM MDT... At 640 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Gun Barrel, or 23 miles northeast of Cheyenne, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gun Barrel and Meriden Rest Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; Goshen County
